keyMoments.title: Den's Debut - Tom's Younger Brother
keyMoments.description: Den meets Franky at the Sea Forest ship graveyard and reveals himself as Tom's younger brother, surprising Franky with their lack of resemblance.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a connection to Tom's legacy and provides exposition about fish-man genetics.

keyMoments.title: Explains Fish-Man Genetics
keyMoments.description: Den explains to Franky how fish-men and merfolk carry dormant ancestral genes that can skip generations, allowing siblings to look completely different.
keyMoments.significance: Provides important world-building information about fish-man biology.

relationships.description: Den is Tom's younger brother, though they look different due to fish-man genetics.

evolutionMoments.description: Den reveals to Franky that he is Tom's younger brother.

relationships.description: Den meets Franky through their shared connection to Tom and helps him locate the Thousand Sunny.

evolutionMoments.description: Den and Franky meet at the Sea Forest.

reveals.information: Explains fish-man genetic inheritance and ancestral traits

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Invades Ryugu Palace
keyMoments.description: Hody Jones and Vander Decken IX successfully invade Ryugu Palace with their forces, declaring the end of the Ryugu Kingdom.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Hody's coup attempt and the major conflict of the arc.
keyMoments.quote: This will be the last day of the Ryugu Kingdom. We will be the new rulers of the seafloor.

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Former Neptune Army Soldier
keyMoments.description: Neptune recognizes Hody as a former talented soldier who infiltrated the army only to gain combat experience for his rebellion.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Hody's long-term planning and infiltration strategy.
keyMoments.quote: I only joined the army to gain combat experience.

keyMoments.title: Floods Ryugu Palace
keyMoments.description: Hody demonstrates his raw strength by crushing a palace wall with his bare hand, flooding the palace.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hody's immense physical power and ruthless nature.

keyMoments.title: Uses Yabusame Attack
keyMoments.description: Hody launches his signature Yabusame technique, firing water droplets like arrows to injure Neptune and his forces.
keyMoments.significance: First display of Hody's signature fish-man karate technique.

abilities.description: Hody buries his hand in water and pulls it to launch powerful water droplets that fly like arrows, capable of piercing targets.
Hody demonstrates ability to crush palace walls with his bare hands.

reveals.information: Former soldier of the Neptune Army who infiltrated to gain combat experience
Can use Yabusame (Archer Shark) attack and has immense physical strength

name.japanese: バンダー・デッケン九世

keyMoments.title: Invades Ryugu Palace with Hody
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken IX arrives at Ryugu Palace alongside Hody Jones to capture Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the temporary alliance between Decken and Hody for their mutual goals.

keyMoments.title: Leaves to Pursue Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: Upon learning Shirahoshi is missing, Decken abandons the palace invasion and leaves to hunt for her, declaring she will die if she belongs to another.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Decken's obsessive nature and single-minded pursuit of Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.quote: The princess will die in a sea of blood if she becomes someone else's.

reveals.information: Will kill Shirahoshi rather than let her belong to someone else

keyMoments.title: Uses Gigantesco Mano (Off-Screen)
keyMoments.description: Robin defeats multiple Ammo Knights using her Gigantesco Mano technique, though the execution happens off-screen.
keyMoments.significance: First mention of Robin's enhanced post-timeskip giant limb techniques.

abilities.description: Robin creates giant limbs using her Hana Hana no Mi powers, learned during the two-year timeskip.

reveals.information: Can create giant limbs with Gigantesco Mano technique

keyMoments.title: Recognizes Hody as Former Soldier
keyMoments.description: Neptune recognizes Hody Jones as a former talented soldier of the Neptune Army, shocked by his betrayal.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Neptune's knowledge of Hody's past and the depth of the betrayal.

keyMoments.title: Injured by Hody's Yabusame
keyMoments.description: Neptune and his soldiers are injured by Hody's Yabusame attack while captured and defenseless.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Neptune's vulnerability and Hody's willingness to attack the captured king.

reveals.information: Knew Hody Jones as a talented soldier in the Neptune Army
